CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 26, 1952, pg. 27, reads: "Steeler Hopefuls - Johnny Spinks, left and Bill Robinson, two candidates for the Pittsburgh Steelers grid team, take time out from there [their] grid drills at Pitt Stadium this week to pose for Courier cameraman Teenie Harris. The hard-running backs left Tuesday morning for the Steelers training quarters in Olean, N. Y."
TitMainTitle: Three men, including Bill Robinson, and Johnny Spinks, candidates for Pittsburgh Steelers Football team, running in Pitt Stadium, Oakland
